channel.description:
how do i swap my 317 server to 508? i know this is mostly client-sided , but anything server-sided i have to know?
lots of ppl hate 317 graphics , so i kinda have to do this -_-

item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

This is a very tough task to accomplish. You would have to edit… for starters… packet IDs, how the cache is loaded (client-based), model IDs, texture IDs… the works. Here’s my suggestion: download and edit a blank 508 server and client rather than making your client and server 508. It would save you A LOT of time.

Read full topic
